arts.ttl: Uruguay beats Colombia 3-2 on last-minute goal in South American qualifying
arts.sum: Uruguay beat Colombia 3-2 on Friday with a last-minute goal in South American World Cup qualifying, and eased the pressure on coach Marcelo Bielsa. Argentina, which lost 2-1 to Paraguay on Thursday, remains on top of the 10-team South American round-robin competition with 22 points in 11 matches, with Uruguay and Colombia hree points behind.

arts.ttl: Sanabria scores perfect bicycle kick goal against Lautaro’s Argentina – Video
arts.sum: Antonio Sanabria of Torino found a spectacular way to inspire Paraguay’s 2-1 win over Argentina...

arts.ttl: When is Uruguay - Colombia? How to watch on TV, stream online
arts.sum: The game between Uruguay - Colombia will be played on Friday November 15, with kick off at 7:00p.m. ET/ 4:00 p.m. PT at Centenario Stadium, Montevideo. Bielsa has come under fire lately and is mainly due to Luis Suarez’s words against the legendary coach and his approach to the day-to-day situation of the team.

arts.ttl: Clavijo's story: What Bielsa's analyst turned 'translator' at Leeds did next
arts.sum: "Most people thought I was just his translator," Andres Clavijo tells Sky Sports. "It was hard to get away from the stigma of that, almost." This desire to reinvent himself as a coach has taken him to Perth in Australia, the most remote city on earth.

arts.ttl: Ex-Uruguay striker Forlán loses pro doubles debut
arts.sum: Former soccer star Diego Forlán's newfound career in professional tennis started with a doubles loss Wednesday at the Uruguay Open.
